pages.text: In Vanilla, all items without an explicit $(l:zenith:enchanting/table/enchantability)Item Enchantability$() have a default of zero.$(p)zenith changes the default to one.$(p)This has the side effect of making some items unintentionally enchantable.
This tweak does not change the enchantability of items that have an explicit value.$(p)Items with an enchantability of zero can never be enchanted.
